name: 9 Empires
summary:
A unique mix of strategy and role-playing in a fantasy setting - play in your browser without any installation! Create your own empire by building vast cities, researching new technology and laying siege to your enemies. Train your heroes, find, upgrade and use thousands of items, experience hundreds of quests and battle it out with friends and enemies. Delve into the vast world of 9 Empires: travel through continents, explore sinister dungeons and visit great cities. Experience many different landscapes that range from deserts to snow-covered mountains and lava canyons! 
 
Create up to 5 heroes the way you like them. Make your perfect team of heroes with different skills, weapons, armour and attributes. You can even send your heroes to train while you're away. You're their master, put them to work! 
 
The world of 9 Empires offers numerous tasks, challenges and opportunities. 
 
The game was taken offline on March 2012 due to lack of technical support.
